document.heading: Pesticide Education and Control Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-191, the “Pesticide Education and Control Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-643. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 26, 2012, and July 10, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 9, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-446 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-191 became effective on October 23, 2012.
